Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.cli.viewables

package it.polimi.ingsw.view.cli.viewables
  • Interface Summary
    Interface
    Description
    Viewable
    Manages every type of Viewable in the CLI
  • Class Summary
    Class
    Description
    ActionTile
    Represents the action tile for the game in the solo mode.
    ActiveProductions
    Represents a list of the productions of the player.
    BaseProduction
    Represents the BaseProduction of the player
    DevelopmentCard
    This class creates the viewable of the development card used in DevelopmentSpace and DevelopmentSpaceGrid
    DevelopmentGrid
    Represents the grid composed by every card of teh game
    DevelopmentGridCard
    This class creates the viewable of the development card used in the DevelopmentGrid
    DevelopmentSpace
    Represents the single development space, consisting of one, two or three stacked cards
    DevelopmentSpaceGrid
    Represents the three DevelopmentSpace(s) of the player
    FaithTrack
    Represents the position of all players in the faith track
    LeaderCard
    This class creates the viewable of the leader card used in LeaderCardSpace of the player
    LeaderCardSpace
    Represents the space containing the two LeaderCard(s) of the player
    LeaderPick
    Represents the space containing the four LeaderCard(s) picked by the player he will choose two of them
    MarbleContainer
    Contains the marbles picked from the Marketplace
    Marketplace
    Represents the MarketPlace composed by 13 marbles (12 in the grid and 1 in the slide)
    Production
    Represents the viewable of a production composed by an input, an output and a currentSupply
    SupplyContainer
    Represents the SupplyContainer
    ViewableFactory
    Class responsible for the creation of viewables and for their census.
    Warehouse
    Represents the viewable of the Warehouse
